entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
